answers.answer: Probably depends on how bad it is.
I was induced at 33 weeks protein in my urine was at 7000

It really does depend on how bad you have it like how much protein is in your urine and if your blood pressure is getting high. I had it with my first and got induced at 39 weeks.  That's when I had to much protein and they couldn't get my bp under control.
I had that and i got induced at 36 -weeks
Im 24 weeks and I had protein in my urine at 23 weeks and was half dehydrated is that a sign of preeclampsia?
I honestly don't know I'm actually getting tested tomorrow.  But check with you're doctor because preeclpsia is serious

Sometimes protein in the urine isn't always pre eclampsia i had protein in my urine at 24 week check up next check up there was no protein my midwife said it can just Purley be what you've eating or had to drink that shows up with protein in the urine im now 32 weeks and can't stop thinking that i have pre eclampsia and they haven't detected it i know how serious it is but i have regular scans because im epileptic so i think they would be able to detect it later on in pregnancy...it depends how serious it is they have to induce you early they don't have a choice but yeah anyways don't worry too much about protein in you're urine x
I was exactly 38 weeks when I had my daughter because of it. I had high bp protein levels and was swelling so they did not make me wait any longer
I also have HB but it's because I get nervous while they check me it's silly so may be causing myself that.  But hopefully this test doesn't come up positive or I'm mostlikely getting induced

question: If you have preeclampsia do you get induced at 36 or 37 weeks?? I'm 35 weeks and I'm being tested for it
title: preeclampsia
